text.quote: 000: Clause 2, page 2, line 6, leave out “a Minister of the Crown or permanent secretary” and insert—
text.IndentOne: (b) a special adviser to a Minister of the Crown;
(c) a parliamentary private secretary to a Minister of the Crown;
(e) the chair of the governing board of a non-ministerial government department;
(f) the chief executive of a non-ministerial government department irrespective of their civil service grade;
(g) the chief scientific adviser to a government department;”
